scripts.ver:webpack:version-installed: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m''Webpack version installed: '$'\033[0m' ; npm list webpack "
scripts.ver:webpack:latest-version-available: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m''Webpack latest version available: '$'\033[0m' ; npm view webpack version "
scripts.ver:git:default-remote: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m''Git default remote: '$'\033[0m' ; git push --dry-run -v "
scripts.os-ver: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m''OS Version:'$'\033[0m' ; cat /etc/os-release 2>/dev/null ; lsb_release -a 2>/dev/null ; hostnamectl 2>/dev/null "
scripts.platform-ver: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m''Platform Version:'$'\033[0m' ; systeminfo | grep "OS Name" 2>/dev/null ; systeminfo | grep "OS Version" 2>/dev/null "
scripts.pipeline:start:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 CI/CD pipeline START | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.sys-info:heroku-config: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all heroku-config | grep -v _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:heroku: bash ./launch " if [ "$HEROKU" ] ; then env | grep -F HEROKU | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:appveyor: bash ./launch " if [ "$APPVEYOR" ] ; then env | grep -F APPVEYOR | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:circleci: bash ./launch " if [ "$CIRCLECI" ] ; then env | grep -F CIRCLECI | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:travis: bash ./launch " if [ "$TRAVIS" ] ; then env | grep -F TRAVIS | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:angular: bash ./launch " if [ "$ANGULAR" ] ; then env | grep -F ANGULAR | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:node: bash ./launch " if [ "$NODE" ] ; then env | grep -F NODE | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:npm: bash ./launch " if [ "$NPM" ] ; then env | grep -F NPM | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.sys-info:nvm: bash ./launch " if [ "$NVM" ] ; then env | grep -F NVM | grep -Fv _TOKEN ; fi "
scripts.report-goal: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m'Plan: Starting a full-featured DevSecOps CI/CD pipeline SD process:â€¦$'\033[0m' "
scripts.dev:plan:update:report:action:override-u: bash ./launch " if [ "$CV_GENERATOR_OVERRIDE_UPDATE_PACKAGES" ] ; then npm-run-all override:update-packages:* ; fi "
scripts.overridden:update-packages:npx-npm-check: bash ./launch " echo y | npx npm-check-updates --target minor --timeout 600000 -u --packageFile package.json && npm install "
scripts.deprecated:update-packages: bash ./launch " node wipe-dependencies.js && rm -rf node_modules && npm update --save-dev && npm update --save "
scripts.update-packages:report: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m'Update: Updated everything to latest \(or next\).$'\033[0m' "
scripts.dev:plan:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 PLAN: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.dev:code:scaffold:generate:action: bash ./launch " exit ; if [ "$(date +%u)" -eq 4 ]; then if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then cd ../cv-generator-life-scaffolder/scripts && ./scaffold-generate.sh ; fi ; fi "
scripts.dev:code:scaffold:transform:action: bash ./launch " exit ; if [ "$(date +%u)" -eq 4 ]; then if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then cd ../cv-generator-life-scaffolder/scripts && ./scaffold-transform.sh ; fi ; fi "
scripts.dev:code:scaffold:launch:action: bash ./launch " exit ; if [ "$(date +%u)" -eq 4 ]; then if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then cd ../cv-generator-life-scaffolder/scripts && ./scaffold-launch.sh ; fi ; fi "
scripts.dev:code:rejuvenate:action: bash ./launch " exit ; if [ "$(date +%u)" -eq 4 ]; then if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then cd ../cv-generator-life-scaffolder/scripts && ./scaffold.sh ; fi ; fi "
scripts.dev:code:report:action:report: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m'CODE: Coded everything. Implemented the new features planned.$'\033[0m' "
scripts.dev:code:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 CODE: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.dev:build:install:prepare:action: bash ./launch " if [ "$(date +%H%M)" -gt 2100 -a "$(date +%H%M)" -lt 2200 ]; then if [ $SNYK_TOKEN ] ; then npx snyk auth $SNYK_TOKEN ; else echo Snyk auth: no token ; fi ; else echo Skipping Snyk auth. ; fi "
scripts.prepare:snyk-protect: bash ./launch " if [ '' -a "$(date +%H%M)" -gt 2100 -a "$(date +%H%M)" -lt 2200 ]; then npx snyk-protect ; else echo Skipping Snyk protect \(deprecated\). ; fi "
scripts.dev:build:install:package:platform:actio: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks --remote heroku -a \$app; done "
scripts.off:dev:build:install:package:platform:a: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:clear -a \$app; done "
bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 1 heroku-community/chrome-for-testing -a \$app; done "
scripts.dev:build:install:package:platform:actio: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 2 heroku/metrics -a \$app; done "
bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 3 https://github.com/DataDog/heroku-buildpack-datadog.git -a \$app; done "
bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 4 heroku/nodejs -a \$app; done "
scripts.off:dev:build:install:package:platform:a: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 5 heroku/jvm -a \$app; done "
bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 6 heroku/python -a \$app; done "
bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:add -i 7 https://github.com/heroku/heroku-buildpack-prometheus.git -a \$app; done "
scripts.dev:build:install:report:action: bash ./launch " npm run ver && echo $'\033[0;32m'Build: Install: Installed and fixed all dependencies.$'\033[0m' "
scripts.dev:build:build:package:action: bash ./launch " if [ "$CI" ] ; then npm run build-ci ; else npm run build-prod ; fi "
scripts.build: bash ./launch " if [ "$CI" ] ; then npm run PIPELINE ; else ng build --subresource-integrity ; fi "
scripts.dev:build:build:analyze:action: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all showcase:analyze-build:* ; fi "
scripts.showcase:analyze-build: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all showcase:analyze-build:* ; fi "
scripts.showcase:analyze-build:webpack-bundle-an: bash ./launch " npx webpack-bundle-analyzer dist/stats.json --log-level debug --mode static --report dist/logs/analyze-build-results/stats-report.html "
scripts.heroku:clear:cache: bash ./launch " heroku config:set NODEMODULESCACHE=false NODE_MODULES_CACHE=false --remote heroku "
scripts.heroku:rebuild: bash ./launch " git commit --allow-empty -m "empty commit" && git push heroku master "
scripts.heroku:status-each: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; echo -e '\tmaintenance:\t'\$(heroku maintenance -a \$app 2>/dev/null); echo -e '\tscale:\t\t'\$(heroku scale -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.heroku:status:maintenance: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; echo -e '\tmaintenance:\t'\$(heroku maintenance -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.heroku:status:maintenance:on: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; heroku maintenance:on -a \$app 2>/dev/null; echo -e '\tmaintenance:\t'\$(heroku maintenance -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.heroku:status:maintenance:off: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; heroku maintenance:off -a \$app 2>/dev/null; echo -e '\tmaintenance:\t'\$(heroku maintenance -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.heroku:status:scale: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; echo -e '\tscale:\t\t'\$(heroku scale -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.heroku:status:scale:on: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; heroku scale web=1 -a \$app 2>/dev/null; echo -e '\tscale:\t\t'\$(heroku scale -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.heroku:status:scale:off: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do echo -e '\n'\$app:; heroku scale web=0 -a \$app 2>/dev/null; echo -e '\tscale:\t\t'\$(heroku scale -a \$app 2>/dev/null); done "
scripts.dev:build:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 BUILD: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.vulnerability-check: bash ./launch " if [ "$(date +%H%M)" -gt 2100 -a "$(date +%H%M)" -lt 2200 ]; then npx snyk test --all-projects -d ; else echo Skipping Snyk test. ; fi "
scripts.test: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$TRAVIS" ] && [ ! "$HEROKU" ] ; then ng test --code-coverage ; fi "
scripts.measure:lighthouse:run: bash ./launch " if [ "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all measure:lighthouse:run:local:silent ; else npm-run-all measure:lighthouse:run:local ; fi "
scripts.measure:lighthouse:run:remote: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true lighthouse https://cv-generator-fe-eu.herokuapp.com/ --output-path=./logs/lighthouse-results/lighthouse.report.html --preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000 --view && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse:run:remote:silent: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true lighthouse https://cv-generator-fe-eu.herokuapp.com/ --output-path=./logs/lighthouse-results/lighthouse.report.html --preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000 && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse:run:local: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true lighthouse http://localhost:5000/ --output-path=./logs/lighthouse-results/lighthouse.report.html --preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000 --view && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse:run:local:silent: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true lighthouse http://localhost:5000/ --output-path=./logs/lighthouse-results/lighthouse.report.html --preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000 && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse-badges:run: bash ./launch " if [ "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all measure:lighthouse-badges:run:remote:silent ; else npm-run-all measure:lighthouse-badges:run:remote ; fi "
scripts.measure:lighthouse-badges:run:remote: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000 --view\" lighthouse-badges --urls https://cv-generator-fe-eu.herokuapp.com/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse-badges:run:remote:sil: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000\" lighthouse-badges --urls https://cv-generator-fe-eu.herokuapp.com/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse-badges:run:local: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000 --view\" lighthouse-badges --urls http://localhost:5000/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:lighthouse-badges:run:local:sile: bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --skip-audits=dom-size,unsized-images,valid-source-maps,aria-allowed-attr,color-contrast,crawlable-anchors,tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000\" lighthouse-badges --urls http://localhost:5000/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "

bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --only-audits=valid-source-maps --max-wait-for-load=120000\" lighthouse-badges --urls http://localhost:5000/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "

bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --only-audits=crawlable-anchors --max-wait-for-load=120000\" lighthouse-badges --urls http://localhost:5000/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "

bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --only-audits=tap-targets --max-wait-for-load=120000\" lighthouse-badges --urls http://localhost:5000/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "

bash ./launch " CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING=true LIGHTHOUSE_BADGES_PARAMS=\"--preset=desktop --throttling.cpuSlowdownMultiplier=0.8 --max-wait-for-load=120000\" lighthouse-badges --urls http://localhost:5000/ --output-path logs/lighthouse-results && unset CV_GENERATOR_AUDITING "
scripts.measure:coverity: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all measure:coverity:* ; fi "
scripts.measure:coverity:package: bash ./launch " tar czvfC coverity/cv-generator-fe.tgz coverity/ cov-int "
scripts.measure:coverity:upload-results: bash ./launch " curl --form token=X4ThO0kuZRFP-srBfqEGjw --form email=yrkki@yahoo.com --form file=@coverity/cv-generator-fe.tgz --form version=\"1.53.0\" --form description=\"Version 1.53.0\" https://scan.coverity.com/builds?project=Yrkki%2Fcv-generator-fe "
scripts.coverage:codecov:method2: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$APPVEYOR" ] ; then bash <(curl -s https://codecov.io/bash) ; fi "
scripts.coverage:codacy-final: bash ./launch " cd coverage && bash <(curl -Ls https://coverage.codacy.com/get.sh) final "
scripts.compodoc: bash ./launch " compodoc -p tsconfig.compodoc.json --theme vagrant --hideGenerator --disableSourceCode --disablePrivate --disableTemplateTab --customFavicon \"./src/assets/icons/android-chrome-512x512.png\" -n \"CV Generator Documentation\" "
scripts.next:copy:root: bash ./launch " find dist/ -maxdepth 1 -type f -execdir cp -r \"{}\" browser/ \";\" "
scripts.e2e: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$HEROKU" ] ; then if [ "$CI" ] ; then ng e2e ; else echo y | ng e2e ; fi ; fi "
scripts.dev:test:iac:test:action:install: bash ./launch " npm-run-all dev:test:iac:test:action:version && pip install checkov "
scripts.dev:test:iac:test:action:update: bash ./launch " npm-run-all dev:test:iac:test:action:version && pip install -U checkov "
scripts.dev:test:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 TEST: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.ops:release:package:action:cleanup: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all ops:release:package:action:cleanup:* ; fi "
scripts.ops:release:package:action:cleanup:chrom: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:remove heroku-community/chrome-for-testing -a \$app; done "
scripts.ops:release:package:action:cleanup:java: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:remove heroku/jvm -a \$app; done "
scripts.ops:release:package:action:cleanup:pytho: bash ./launch " for app in cv-generator-fe-eu cv-generator-fe; do heroku buildpacks:remove heroku/python -a \$app; done "
scripts.semantic-release: bash ./launch " git checkout && GITHUB_TOKEN=$CV_GENERATOR_GITHUB_TOKEN npx semantic-release "
scripts.semantic-release-no-ci: bash ./launch " git checkout && GITHUB_TOKEN=$CV_GENERATOR_GITHUB_TOKEN npx semantic-release --no-ci "
scripts.ops:release:report:action:report: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m'RELEASE: Released everything. New version released: $'\033[0;32m'v$npm_package_version$'\033[0m' "
scripts.ops:release:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 RELEASE: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.ops:deploy:package:containerize:dockeriz: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all dockerize-build ; fi "
bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all dockerize-auth dockerize-push ; fi "
scripts.dockerize-push: bash ./launch " docker push jorich/cv-generator-fe:$npm_package_version && docker push jorich/cv-generator-fe:latest "
scripts.ops:deploy:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 DEPLOY: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.off:wake-up-the-dynos:tk: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then curl cvgenerator.marinov.link ; fi "
scripts.wake-up-the-dynos:ml: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then curl cvgenerator.marinov.link ; fi "
scripts.serve: bash ./launch " if [ -f \"server.js\" ] ; then npm-run-all start:n-monitor:node ; else npm-run-all start:n-monitor:ng ; fi "
scripts.open:remote: bash ./launch " if [ -f \"server.js\" ] ; then node server.js -o https://cv-generator-fe-eu.herokuapp.com/ ; else ng serve --no-hmr --open=true ; fi "
scripts.open:local: bash ./launch " if [ -f \"server.js\" ] ; then node server.js -o http://localhost:5000 ; else ng serve --no-hmr --open=true ; fi "
scripts.ops:run:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 OPERATE: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.ops:monitor:package:trace:performance:ac: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all trace:performance:* ; fi "
scripts.off:trace:performance:prometheus:serve: bash ./launch " if [ "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all off:trace:performance:prometheus:serve:remote ; else npm-run-all off:trace:performance:prometheus:serve:local ; fi "
scripts.trace:performance:papertrail:drains:list: bash ./launch " echo cv-generator-fe && heroku drains --app cv-generator-fe "
scripts.off:trace:performance:papertrail:drains:: curl -G -v -H "X-Papertrail-Token: VCBf18EXlT1gO9dMc9bh" -X POST https://papertrailapp.com/api/v1/searches.json --data-urlencode 'search[name]=cv-generator-fe: Platform errors' --data-urlencode 'search[query]="error code=H" OR "Error R" OR "Error L"' && curl -G -v -H "X-Papertrail-Token: VCBf18EXlT1gO9dMc9bh" -X POST https://papertrailapp.com/api/v1/searches.json --data-urlencode 'search[name]=cv-generator-fe: Deploys' --data-urlencode 'search[query]=program:app/api -scheduler' && curl -G -v -H "X-Papertrail-Token: VCBf18EXlT1gO9dMc9bh" -X POST https://papertrailapp.com/api/v1/searches.json --data-urlencode 'search[name]=cv-generator-fe: Scheduler jobs' --data-urlencode 'search[query]=program:scheduler' && curl -G -v -H "X-Papertrail-Token: VCBf18EXlT1gO9dMc9bh" -X POST https://papertrailapp.com/api/v1/searches.json --data-urlencode 'search[name]=cv-generator-fe: Dyno state changes' --data-urlencode 'search[query]=web (Idling OR Unidling OR Cycling OR "State changed" OR "Starting process")' && curl -G -v -H "X-Papertrail-Token: VCBf18EXlT1gO9dMc9bh" -X POST https://papertrailapp.com/api/v1/searches.json --data-urlencode 'search[name]=cv-generator-fe: Web app output' --data-urlencode 'search[query]="app/web"'
scripts.ops:monitor:package:showcase:action: bash ./launch " if [ ! "$CI" ] ; then npm-run-all showcase:* ; fi "
scripts.ops:monitor:report:action:report: bash ./launch " echo $'\033[0;32m'MONITOR: Monitoring everything. Observability dashboards launched.$'\033[0m' "
scripts.ops:monitor:report:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 MONITOR: all done | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.pipeline:finish:action:shout: bash ./launch " echo && figlet -f banner3 CI/CD pipeline FINISH | sed $'s/#/\033[0;42m \033[m/g' && echo $'\033[0m' "
scripts.PIPELINE: bash ./launch " mkdir -p ./logs && npm-run-all pipeline:start dev ops pipeline:finish 2>&1 | tee ./logs/pipeline.txt "
